body:
Comment 2 by **jae@janrain.com**: 
I completely missed that section of the references page, never having scrolled down as
the references I use are all right at the top.

I do think that the reference section is not the most obvious a place to look for
additional packages. When looking for the sub-repos before filing this bug it didn't
occur to me to look there. I looked on the Packages page, the Projects page and the wiki
Projects page.
